mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Harriet Lane Johnston to Jose de Pedroso, undated
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Johnston, Harriet Lane, 1830-1903
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from Harriet Lane Johnston to Jose de Pedroso, a Spanish nobleman married to Camille Berghmans de Pedroso, the daughter of Lily Macalester Berghmans Laughton. In the letter, Mrs. Johnston accepts an invitation to dine with Mr. de Pedroso.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Papers of Lily Macalester Berghmans Laughton
